body: Hi everyone. I was wondering whether it would be possible to calculate only one output of a component in Ladybug. I would like to optimize the orientation of a panel with Galapagos, where the: - Genome = Panel Orientation  - Fitness = ACenergyPerYear This is running very slowly and I was thus wondering if all the other outputs of the Photovoltaics Surface could be disabled to make it run faster. Any other suggestions are welcome as well. Thank you. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/0N6V1bax3FM0aY6-6QskfFb7If*QNgXvfD4wZkzUExMhNjyTfNG30XZXT6hAna1k4ETeP3KPZV4nmBOOpBmVixtudKMpkDRC/Capture14.PNG)
